effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores [HP]{mechanic:hp} to full and cures any [status ailment]{mechanic:status-ailment} and [confusion]{mechanic:confusion}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケモン　１匹の　ＨＰと
状態異常を　すべて
回復する。

A medicine that can be used to fully
restore the HP of a single Pokémon
and heal any status conditions it has.

Rimedio che restituisce tutti i PS a un Pokémon
e cura i suoi problemi di stato.

Medicina que restaura todos los PS y cura todos
los problemas de estado de un Pokémon.

Dieses Item stellt alle KP eines Pokémon
wieder her und behebt alle Statusprobleme.

Un médicament qui restaure tous les PV
d’un Pokémon et soigne tous ses problèmes
de statut.

포켓몬 1마리의 HP와
상태 이상을 모두
회복한다.

ポケモン　１ひきの　ＨＰと
じょうたい　いじょうを　すべて
かいふくする。

A medicine that fully restores the HP
and heals any status problems of a
single Pokémon.

A medicine that fully restores the HP
and heals any status problems of a
single Pokémon.

Un médicament qui restaure tous les
PV d’un Pokémon et soigne tous ses
problèmes de statut.

and heals any status problems of a
